title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid input data and receives authentication tokens.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Fill out the registration form with valid username, email, and password
Submit the registration form
Check that the user is registered and redirected to onboarding
Verify that authentication tokens are generated and stored securely

title: User Registration with Invalid Data
description: Verify that registration fails with invalid inputs such as malformed email or weak password and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter invalid email and weak password in the registration form
Submit the registration form
Check validation errors are displayed for invalid email and weak password
Verify user is not registered and remains on the registration page

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure that a registered user can log in successfully and session is maintained.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input correct email and password
Click the login button
Verify user is authenticated and navigated to dashboard
Check session token is stored and valid

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login failure and correct error response occurs when invalid credentials are submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input incorrect email and/or password
Click the login button
Check that login fails and correct error message is displayed
Verify user is not authenticated and remains on login page

title: Complete Onboarding Flow
description: Validate that new users can complete onboarding by setting preferences and the data is stored correctly.

steps.description: After registration, proceed to onboarding page
Input all required preferences during onboarding
Submit onboarding form
Verify preferences are saved in user profile
Check user is redirected to the Vibe Local discovery page

title: Onboarding with Missing Required Fields
description: Check that onboarding fails with missing or invalid preference fields and displays validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to onboarding page after registration
Leave required fields empty or input invalid data
Try to submit the onboarding form
Validate that form shows proper validation messages
Form submission is blocked until valid data is entered

title: Discover Nearby Locations Using Geolocation
description: Verify the app correctly obtains the user's location and displays nearby locations in a swipe interface.

steps.description: Grant location permission when prompted
Navigate to Vibe Local page
Confirm that geolocation data is obtained with correct coordinates
Verify a list of relevant nearby locations is displayed in swipe cards
Swipe through locations and verify UI responsiveness

title: Handle Denied Geo-Location Permission
description: Test app behavior when user denies location permission: it should gracefully handle and show an appropriate message or fallback.

steps.description: Deny geolocation permission in browser or device
Navigate to Vibe Local page
Confirm that an appropriate error or informational message is shown to user
Verify that app does not crash and user can continue in other app sections

title: Apply Filters and Search on Locations List
description: Verify filtering and search functionality works correctly on Locations page for various criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to Locations page
Enter search keywords and apply various filters (e.g. category, distance)
Verify the displayed locations match the applied filter criteria and search keywords
Clear filters and verify full results are shown

title: People Matching Compatibility Calculation
description: Validate that the compatibility algorithm generates expected match scores and displays matching profiles correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to People matching page
Verify profiles are listed based on compatibility scores
Click on profiles and verify details and interests are correctly shown
Cross-check compatibility score with input preferences

title: Create Match and Initiate Chat on Mutual Like
description: Verify that when two users mutually like each other, a match is created and chat session is automatically initialized.

steps.description: User A likes User B
User B likes User A
Check match is created between User A and User B
Verify chat between matched users is initialized and accessible to both

title: Send and Receive Messages in Real-Time Chat
description: Test that users can send and receive messages instantly with live updates and unread counters increase accordingly.

steps.description: Open chat window with a matched user
User A sends a message to User B
Verify User B receives the message in real time without refresh
Check unread message counters increment appropriately for User B
User B replies and User A receives message instantly

title: Edit and Save User Profile with Valid Data
description: Verify user can update profile information and changes are saved and reflected immediately.

steps.description: Go to Profile page
Modify profile fields with valid inputs including preferences and settings
Save changes
Verify changes are saved and displayed correctly

title: Attempt Profile Update with Invalid Data
description: Test that invalid profile inputs are blocked by validation and user is informed with relevant error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile page
Enter invalid data into profile fields (e.g. invalid email format)
Try to save changes
Validate appropriate error messages are shown and changes are not saved

title: Navigation Tab Switching
description: Verify that navigation tabs allow switching between sections without errors or delays.

steps.description: Use navigation tabs to move between Home, Locations, People, Messages, Profile, and Dashboard
Confirm each tab load the correct page content quickly and without errors

title: Check-in at a Location
description: Verify that user can perform check-in at a nearby location and the app records the engagement.

steps.description: Navigate to a location detail page
Click on the check-in button
Confirm check-in is recorded and feedback is shown to user

title: Unauthorized Access Restriction via RLS
description: Verify that Row-Level Security policies restrict users from accessing unauthorized data properly.

steps.description: Try to access data (e.g. messages, profiles) of other users without permission
Confirm access is denied and no unauthorized data is exposed

title: Database Migration Scripts Execution
description: Test execution of database migration scripts to ensure tables, indexes, functions, and triggers are created or updated correctly.

steps.description: Run all provided database migration scripts in a staging environment
Check that all database objects (indices, functions, triggers) exist and operate as intended

title: Performance Under Load for Location Discovery
description: Evaluate application responsiveness and performance of location discovery when multiple users access simultaneously.

steps.description: Simulate multiple users performing location discovery concurrently
Verify response times remain acceptable and no crashes or errors occur

title: Validation of Incoming Data to Services
description: Test that app services validate incoming data correctly according to Zod schemas and reject invalid inputs.

steps.description: Send invalid data payloads to API endpoints for authentication, profile update, and matching services
Verify rejection with suitable error messages and no corrupted data is stored
